com.samsung.android.sdk.gesture

Class Sgesture

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.samsung.android.sdk.gesture.Sgesture
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    SsdkInterface
    Deprecated.

    @Deprecated
public class Sgesture
extends java.lang.Object
implements SsdkInterface
    This class is the entry class that provides access to the Gesture package. This class provides methods for initializing the Gesture package and for checking whether the Gesture feature is supported.
    Since:
    1.0.0

      • initialize

        public void initialize(android.content.Context context)
                throws SsdkUnsupportedException,
                       java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Deprecated. 
        Initialize an instance of the Gesture package.
        Specified by:
        initialize in interface SsdkInterface
        Parameters:
        context - The Context for your application.
        Throws:
        SsdkUnsupportedException - Thrown if the device is not Samsung, doesn't support the feature, or the SDK version is not matched.
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - Thrown if the Context passed is null or wrong.
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - Thrown if initialize() function is already called.
        Since:
        1.0.0

      • isFeatureEnabled

        public boolean isFeatureEnabled(int type)
        Deprecated. 
        Check if the Gesture package feature is available on the device.
        Specified by:
        isFeatureEnabled in interface SsdkInterface
        Parameters:
        type - The feature ID(use TYPE_HAND_PRIMITIVE).
        Returns:
        true - if the Gesture package feature is available on the device.
        false - if the Gesture package feature is not available on the device.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - Thrown if the method is called before calling the initialize() method or if this the Gesture package is not supported on the device.
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - Thrown if the feature ID passed is not valid.
        Since:
        1.0.0
